Articles.Content: Is there any way to extend your landing struts in the VAB; i.e. to see exactly how much clearance you have to work with?
Not at the present, but the devs plan on adding the ability at some point in the future.

As it is now, no. the Firespitter plugin allows this for cargo bays so you can do it with firespitter and the b9 cargo bays but gear, no. It would come in handy to see how they come down especially for those of us using landing legs as they were never intended.
Currently, one way to test them is to put the rocket on the launch pad but not launch it. Then, revert back to the VAB for further assembly.
